title: How to watch and livestream the Tour of Britain 2023
content:
Cyclist
How to watch and livestream the Tour of Britain 2023

The Tour of Britain returns. Beginning in Altrincham on Sunday 3rd September, the 2023 edition will take riders though England and Wales over eight stages for a finish in Caerphilly on Sunday 10th September. It will be a relatively flat affair until the final two stages, with the Queen Stage the 166.8km final day from Margam County to Caerphilly.

Despite the final three stages of the Tour of Britain in 2022 being cancelled following the death of Queen Elizabeth II, Gonzalo Serrano (Movistar) was declared the overall winner after Stage 5 into Mansfield. Serrano returns to the start line this year alongside 2021 victor Wout van Aert (Jumbo-Visma) and last year’s runner-up, MTB XCO World Champion Tom Pidcock (Ineos Grenadiers) for a no doubt entertaining battle over – fingers crossed – a full eight stages.

How can I watch the Tour of Britain 2023?

For those not catching the action live, ITV4 will be providing live coverage and highlights for viewers in the UK. ITV4 is available on Freeview (channel 25), Freesat (channel 117), Sky (channel 120), Virgin Media (channel 118) and the ITV Hub (online) in the UK. The Tour of Britain will also be broadcast live in the UK on Eurosport with streaming on GCN+ and Discovery+ (with the same coverage).

GCN+ costs £6.99 paid monthly, or £39.99 per year and Discovery+ costs £6.99 per month or £59.99 per year for sports and entertainment (for fans of shows like Wheeler Dealers and Naked and Afraid).

Streaming coverage via GCN+ will be available in Asia, Europe, Oceania and North America.

Highlights packages will also be available on all broadcasters’ channels including ITV4 highlights shows at 20:00 every evening (apart from Monday 4th, which will be at 21:00) and short highlights will also be free to watch on YouTube.

Official broadcasters

Asia: Eurosport and GCN+
Colombia: RTVC
Europe: Eurosport, Discovery+, GCN+
Middle East: Starzplay
North Africa: Starzplay
North America: GCN+
Oceania: Eurosport and GCN+
Sub-Saharan Africa: SuperSport
UK: ITV4, Eurosport, GCN+, Discovery+
